For a complete gym see the entire Fun and Fitness for Kids collection (Treadmill, Stationary Bike, Walker, Weight Bench, Rower, Trampoline, Dumbbell Set, and Jump Rope with Full Video Instruction Program, Barbell Set, Fitness/Yoga Mat).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Never leave children unattended while using exercise equipment Fun & Fitness for Kids is a great way to encourage and Activity Based Lifestyle, good health, and enjoying time together. Treadmill - Stationary Bike - Walker - Weight Bench - Rower Trampoline - Dumbbell Set - Barbell Set - Full Size Fitness Mat Jump Rope and Video Training Treadmill is powered by human power only Stationary Bike Some assembly required. Tools are included (wrench and Phillips screw driver)MONITOR features a timer with AUTO OFF (if no signal is found for 10 minutes, it automatically shuts off). Battery operated monitorFeatures tension and seat height adjustment.Low impact work out Weight Bench Some assembly required. Tools are included (wrench and Phillips screw driver).The weight of the bench press bar is approximately 4.25 lbs. The bar weighs approximately 2 lbs. The “weights” are made of foam and the Large weighs approximately 10 oz., the Medium weighs approximately 5 oz., and the small weighs approximately 2 oz. The total approximate weight is 4.25 lbs. including the bar.This weight bench provides different exercises: the bench press, leg lift, and barbell exercises.The bench is adjustable. collection treadmill is human powered

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2017
Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Had to use some strategy and elbow grease during assembly.
reviews.reviewText: All of the parts came and worked one of the weldings that held the Piston and the rowing arm was off I had to use a clamp to bend it as I tightened the bolt during assembly. If this wasn't an issue or gets resolved in manufacturing I think this product is easily 5 stars. Without the issue I had this would have been a 10-15 minute assembly. My 4yr old loves the finished product though, I would recommend with the warning that it may have an issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good idea but bad product
reviews.reviewText: The rower is cool HOWEVER I have received 2 of them and both have leaking pistons, oil allover the machine!! I have sent one back but Amazon hasn't sent me a 2nd box. I need a box if they want it back. I did also ask for just new pistons but never got a reply on that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My 6 year old loves it! Even the 9 year old uses it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2013
reviews.reviewText: 4 stars instead of 5 because the company didn't include the right number of screws to attach the handles. I managed to attached the handle with the longer screw that was provided, but sits a little funny, and I'm not sure how long it'll hold properly. It shipped fast, but the box was torn which I suppose is a post office problem. My son is 4.5 yrs old and has autism, he seeks pressure/input to his arms a lot so I figured this would be a good purchase. I like the size, it doesn't take up much room, it takes some muscle to pull for a little kid, but that's what my son needs. It's nice & sturdy feeling too which is nice, the price was definitely reasonable for the product. My son has used some of the other fitness equipment this company makes (bike, treadmill, elliptical) and is a little more excited about those than this. Wish the feet pedals were a little higher up or adjustable since my son has a hard time using properly, but he'll grow into it soon enough.

reviews.reviewText: Definitely love the concept but one of the tabs the screw goes through is bent a bit. This does not allow the screw to go all of the way in.
